sub_fields.label: Use All Clients Posts
sub_fields.name: clients_marquee_use_all
sub_fields.instructions: If enabled, the marquee uses all Clients posts and their menu order.

sub_fields.label: Clients
sub_fields.name: clients_marquee_clients
sub_fields.instructions: Select clients to include when Manual Select is chosen.

sub_fields.label: Sectors
sub_fields.name: sectors
sub_fields.instructions: Each sector renders as a left tab with content on the right.

sub_fields.label: Form Shortcode
sub_fields.name: newsletter_form_shortcode
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the form shortcode or embed tag.
